website_summaries.verdict: One-door mirror that extends its usefulness with a hidden interior cabinet accessible by opening the front mirror. Great for adding more space in addition to bathroom cabinetry.
pros: An excellent multi-tier storage design on the inside
Mirror gracefully swivels open to reveal an organizational surprise perfect for small items or jewelry
cons: Extra storage inside adds weight to the overall design

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this! It has really helped me organize my ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! It has really helped me organize my jewelry - so much better than a regular jewelry box. I do wish it were a smitget deeper so the door would close flush to the base- had to rearrange some jewelry but as long as I use the key, the door will stay closed. Super easy to install & Great buy for the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Evera

customer_reviews.title: lock is horrible
customer_reviews.text: it is beautiful and hold all my necklaces much nicer than the Jewlwry box I previously had but the lock doesnt stay locked. it will be locked and the door will swing open and the latch will still be down in the locked position. I will have to go get some magnets and fix the problem otherwise it would be a 5 star product. no ossues with blemishes like seen on other reviews. just doesnt stay locked which is a problem with the amount of jewlery I keep in it. already had to pick up stuff that fell out when I opened the door and I have had it less than 48 hrs.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly F Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Buy a different one
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. Arrived with mirror coming apart from cabinet door. Lock does not work. I tried Velcro but the it still didn't keep the door closed. I tried hooks but the wood started to crack. Jewelry fits well enough but with door and mirror constantly swinging open it's more of a annoyance than an asset. Buy a different one that has a real mechanism to keep the door closed.
customer_reviews.author: ShellieB123

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect jewelry organizer for someone with limited space! I love it! Yes, the lock is poorly constructed but it still works for me. I'm sure you could get some kind of replacement lock at any hardware store for next to nothing. It's definitely worth the price. Comparable cabinets cost double what I paid for this one. The mirror is a real mirror also, ( I saw one review that said it wasn't.)
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Good mirror, lock isn't great
customer_reviews.text: Very nice mirror and plenty of storage. The locking mechanism is pretty annoying though. The magnets aren't strong enough to keep it closed, especially with a door moving, and the front still pops open with it locked. Still, pretty good bargain and I just bought some stronger magnets and glued them on to keep the front closed. I don't care about being able to lock it, I just want it to stay closed when the door it's hanging from is opened and closed. I will say I think the mirror is glass and not that cheap reflective plastic so no issues there.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole P.

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed about anythiig small enough can unlock it
customer_reviews.text: The lock mechanism is only issue I have by mistake pcked up what I thought was the key for this well, it was the gun case key but it still unlocked , very disappointed about anythiig small enough can unlock it. But it was very easy to put together, love the mirror added bonus to small rm. The way its made is decent enough I love I can put all my jewelery in it and not have to dig around in the small dresser top style jewelery case for the perfect piece I want to wear. It is still a very way to hde jewelery and for small spaces a must hung it over door its geat.
customer_reviews.author: lesia

customer_reviews.title: Great for college dorm; key sucks
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure if the mirror fit on the door of my room or not, but I'm glad it did. The only issue that I have is that the key is very difficult to use. You have to continue to twist and turn the knob to lock and unlock the jewelry case. This is the only reason that I'm giving this product 4/5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Celine Co

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love it!!! Absolutely perfect for my all my jewelry. The price was excellent and the quality of the product is great. I like the drawers as well. I hung it over my bedroom door and it was a great way to organize my jewelry and make it easier to find stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Lovetoread

customer_reviews.title: Door doesn't stay shut
customer_reviews.text: While this item is visually attractive and spacious for jewelry, the door does not stay shut unless you keep it locked which is impossible because the lock is flimsy and impossible to use. When I finally did get it locked (which only happened once) my friend was able to open the door without the key (she didn't realize it was "locked"). Also, my mirror has a cut in the top right corner. At first I thought it was a protective film for shipping but then I realized it is just a cut of the glass. Disappointed for the money I spent but too much of a pain to ship back and I didn't keep the box.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this mirror! You have the option to hang it over the door (hooks included) or mount it onto the wall (screws also included for this). I chose to hang mine over the door and was initially worried it would be a little heavy for our cheap doors (lol) but it seems to be just great. I'm not really a ring person so I actually stuck all of my stud earrings into the ring slots and that seems to work even better. Very pleased! It also arrived before the estimated arrival date.
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn

customer_reviews.title: Great product and quality used except few nudges mentioned below....
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars and not 5 is because product is absolutely great and exactly how it's described. However, just a little nudge that the cabinet door wouldn't close without having to lock each time you open. I like easy access and so to unlock the door every time you want to open the cabinet can get annoying when you open it so many times in a day. Also, wished cabinet depth was more than 3.5 because door wouldn't close if you have thick necklaces on the necklace hook. Overall, loved the product as well as the quality except few nudges mentioned above. Will definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: R.S.

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay closed, door will constantly swing open
customer_reviews.text: This product looks nice, has a nice amount of storage, but since day one has never stayed close. The latch on the door is about 2 inches off from lining up with the latch on the jewelry case so it can’t latch. I have to rig a ponytail contraption to keep it closed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: So I love the jewelry armoire but it could have been designed a little better in regards to where you hang necklaces. I had such an issue with hanging my necklaces on the inside door. The space it gives to close the door isn’t deep enough and I kept having to adjust and readjust the necklace choices to get it to close easily! Other than that the product is great and very helpful. For the price I couldn’t be happier :)
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: ... had just received my mirror jewelry box I really love it it is so cute I haven't hung up ...
customer_reviews.text: I had just received my mirror jewelry box I really love it it is so cute I have it hung up on my bedroom closet door very pretty
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Lynn seegert

customer_reviews.title: You’ll be very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my oh my! I could not have picked a better jewelry box. It has plenty of room. It looks nice. It’s well made. My husband hung it on the wall. It locks with ease. You do not have to lock the door to keep it closed. I’ve read reviews about post earrings. I lay them in the slots and don’t worry about putting the post through the holes. My bulky necklaces are put on the stable side not the door side so there’s no problem closing the door. I store my nail polish in it as well. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Nice but door won't stay closed
customer_reviews.text: Comes fully assembled. Looks beautiful. Easy to hang over a door. Tons and tons of space for jewelry and other accessories. Only problem is that the door doesn't stay closed on its own without locking it. It comes with two sided velcro which can be applied to hold the door closed without the lock but the adhesive on the velcro is a little shotty.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda I.

customer_reviews.title: Product lock not as picture
customer_reviews.text: What I received was different than what is pictured. The picture shows a regular lock and key- which is what it wanted. That is not what I got- it came with some weird chincy key with a little hook lock that is a pain in the bit and hardly ever works- I’ve stuck with it but I hate it and will buy a new once elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Tomaska

customer_reviews.title: Cheap lock but great mirror/case!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It's great! Beautiful mirror and wood, came packaged perfectly! The only thing is the lock is super cheaply made and it doesn't hold the door shut..I cut a little piece of the Velcro it came with and stuck it on the inside of the door so it would stay shut while locked. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kenna

customer_reviews.title: Very good to organize
customer_reviews.text: Very good to organize! Only problem was that my mirror came scratched but I chose to stay with it anyway because of the inconvenience of resending again and waiting a few more days to receive!
customer_reviews.author: Janaina Delvaz Moraes

customer_reviews.title: This item arrived trashed...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and eagerly waited for it, as it seemed like a great solve for my jewelry storage. What I got was a seemingly beautiful piece of furniture...until I turned it around to find the front mirror had been completely destroyed. Tried to get it replaced, but refund was the only option available. I don’t know if I should waste my time purchasing again because I don’t want to receive more damaged material; need to get my house in order sooner rather than later. >:-/
customer_reviews.author: Darren Will & Tina Vaden

customer_reviews.title: Door won’t stay closed? No problem!
customer_reviews.text: The other reviews are somewhat right with the key situation. I have so much jewelry that the door won’t close easily if I try so I’ve just left the key inside the door and twist it locked when I’m away. I don’t have anyone who would try to steal it in my house and my kids are still toddlers so I have no worries that they’ll get to it with how high up it is. I can fit every piece of jewelry I have in there and I even use it to store my nail polish as well! Would DEFINITELY buy this again and I’m hanging on to it as long as I can.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Welte

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: After reading numerous jewelry box reviews, I decided on this one and it's a perfect fit for my jewelry. The boxed arrived securely wrapped and assembly was a breeze. I agree with other reviews that if you have bulky jewelry the jewelry box will not close. I only have a few large pieces, so it wasn’t an issue for me. The lock works fine, so no problem there. I did notice that when the door is closed, there is a small gap at the very top of the door. However, it doesn’t affect the lock or opening/closing of the door.
customer_reviews.author: A. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: So chic and the best way to store your jewelery
customer_reviews.text: Like most other reviews, lock can be finicky because it can come open, however, my gem of a handy boyfriend tinkered around with it and just moved the lock slightly and now it stays closed no problem! Love that is had the option to be mounted or hung over the door (I did the latter because I'm in an apartment).
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly for what it was designed to do.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for what it was designed to do. We mounted ours behind the door on the wall. Very easy to do. Better made than the ones I checked out in the stores. It's larger and was cheaper too. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Shimon

customer_reviews.title: Jewelry cabinet ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I waited so long to get one of these cabinets and I am so glad I finally did! I love jewelry and being able to see it all so well is just great! Some have matching pieces and now they are so easy to find! I love how it is made and wish I had purchased sooner!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: I have loved this! It's great to have a mirror and jewelry box in 1. You can fit lots of things in it. Indo with there was a little more room for bracelets but honestly I've very happy with the amount that can fit in it other wise
customer_reviews.author: Eliza

customer_reviews.title: WILL NOT STAY CLOSED!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for our daughter and intended to hang it on the wall, but it was missing some of the necessary parts for that, so we hung it over her bedroom door instead. Love the inside and the way the jewelry organizer is arranged. But the only way it will stay closed is if the lock is ALWAYS locked, and THE LOCK DOES NOT LOCK. We've taken it apart and tried to make it work, with no luck. We finally ended up putting magnetic strips on the inside of the door and on the body of the chest, and it still swings open sometimes when the bedroom door is opened or closed. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A M Sims

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This item I use for storing my jewelry. I have hung it on the back and of my restroom door. Lock works great to keep things secure. Looks great, quality is great. Great price. All around great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Meh

customer_reviews.title: 4.5 stars...
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price, my only minor complaint is that the door does not stay locked. If I close the door a little to hard the mirror will open. Overall I'm happy with it and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Schulze77

customer_reviews.title: Holds tons of jewelry
customer_reviews.text: This is the most awesome thing. Have it on the bavk of my bathroom door. Door on it is warping a tad due to moisture, but it still works fantastically. Would order again!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline M. Mutters

customer_reviews.title: Nice with lots of storage
customer_reviews.text: Nice with lots of storage. I do wish that it had a handle with a magnetic closure as having to lock it every time is a bit annoying.
customer_reviews.author: vic

customer_reviews.title: I love this jewelry case the only con I have is ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this jewelry case the only con I have is that the key part isn't very easy to lock and unlock and it wasn't hard to put it together but if you're not someone who knows how to screw things into the wall it's a bit difficult also the part for the studs for me doesn't really work but I'm actually going to purchase another one for my mother
customer_reviews.author: Jexyluv

customer_reviews.title: Very good buy
customer_reviews.text: I love my mirror it was really amazing I just don't like the way the earrings are not sure how they're supposed to go in there other than that it's good totally worth it
customer_reviews.author: mahria

customer_reviews.title: The product is a great idea and I wish I could have used but ...
customer_reviews.text: ordered two- both were damaged upon arrival. The mirror was scratched on one and the door on the other one was not nailed in correctly. The product is a great idea and I wish I could have used but didn't want the hassle of having to guess if it would arrive it tact.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cracked mirror
customer_reviews.text: When I received this product the mirror was cracked in many places. Cute in the pictures. But not worth the money as it was broken when it received.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love my jewelry cabinet. I hung it on a door, and it kept coming open when the door was used. I attached those hook and loop Command hangers to the door of the jewelry cabinet, and that keeps it closed. I recommend this cabinet from this company. I wanted another and they were out of stock. I ordered another from another company, and it came broken.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Foster

customer_reviews.title: Great storage, but be prepared to buy a latch
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this, lots of storage! However, the door constantly unhooks after locking it with the key and opening the bedroom door a few times. Works its way out and the jewelry storage front door swings open. Very annoying! We ended up trying the WONDERKID reusable plastic strap that's typically used for baby proofing toilet seats, drawers, etc. It's easy enough for my 8 yr old to unlatch with one hand and has fixed the issue for us!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: This is nice and easy to hang
customer_reviews.text: This is nice and easy to hang, but no magnets to keep it closed?! you have to lock it each time you use it? I am going to see if I can get some kind of magnet myself, I dont like having to lock and unlock it each time I want to look in it. I should have read the reviews more carefully:(
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Star

customer_reviews.title: Behind the door mirror jewelry case
customer_reviews.text: It has the space I expected, but it tends to pop open if I open or close my bedroom door too quickly. The lock is a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey  Foy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great piece. I could organize all my makeup and jewelry in it. The mirror is a little bit distorted but nothing that will deform the image reflection. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Giseli

customer_reviews.title: For this price you can find better
customer_reviews.text: The hook and eye that close this cabinet don't line up. The result is an inferiorating daily experience of running into an open, swinging door. I requested a new door from the company to see if I could remedy the situation. Amazon has asked for an entirely new product. But Best Choice Products says it's out of warranty and they won't fix it. Beware of any "warranties" you might have if you buy this. I suggest looking elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fragile and poor workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Just got this out of the box. Earring holes and slots are crooked and some not wven cut through! Space to put stud earrings w backings is too small so not useable!necklace hooks should have a deep pocket to catch super long necklaces so they fit too! Lastly I was super disappointed that tgere is no magnet w lock. Lock is finicky and broke on its own, my armoire no longer closes!
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend  hanging from door, won’t stay closed
customer_reviews.text: I have this hanging from a door and the mirror will not stay closed/locked. It swings open when I open or close the door it is hanging from, and the drawers occasionally fall out. It would probably work fine if you hang on a wall, but definitely not from a door.
customer_reviews.author: Evenstar

customer_reviews.title: would highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: was exactly what i was looking for, holds items well , only thing i would say bad about it is that has the bars to hang from doors or can mount to a wall but with the bars to hang gives alot of play for it to bang against door when opening door you have it hang on. otherwise it is a great item
customer_reviews.author: tammy boettger

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. Just wish the lock kept the door ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Just wish the lock kept the door shut...taking one star away especially since that has been brought up in so many reviews but it hasn’t been addressed by the manufacturer yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchase
customer_reviews.text: The armoire is great . I’m over satisfied with the purchase but I have a minor issue with it: the earrings hangers are so thick I couldn’t hang all my earrings on it but found the solution and used them for my sunglasses and they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged when received
customer_reviews.text: Mirror was broken when I received item. It appears that I now have to rebox item and take it to a shipping store. This is a pain as the item is not lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Kaite

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don’t love about it is the door is held closed by a magnetic closure which is not quite strong enough. I hung mine on the back of a door and a sometimes the cabinet door pops open if you close the door too hard. Over all I am very happy with it. It holds a ton of stuff and saves so much room.
customer_reviews.author: cook4funpcb

customer_reviews.title: It is fine
customer_reviews.text: Not good enough for ear rings section, you cant hsng them there much, some of them only. But it helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Anryieta Kononenko

customer_reviews.title: This has lots of storage space and looks nice in my bedroom
customer_reviews.text: This has lots of storage space and looks nice in my bedroom. I'm only giving it 4 stars because it turned out to be too heavy to hang on a door, as I had originally planned.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza WIngfield

customer_reviews.title: Condo for my jewelry!
customer_reviews.text: Im still giving 5 stars even though the mirror was broken upon arrival. But, the inside is fabulous, space for all my jewelry, rings, earrings, bracelets, etc. Exactly what i needed & wanted!
customer_reviews.author: hlhk

customer_reviews.title: Get this for your teen, they will love it !
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for teen, she loves it ! All her jewelry stored neat and safe, PLUS a full length mirror, BAM ! AWESOME It was her favorite gift, beat out Alexa !
customer_reviews.author: Beth M

customer_reviews.title: great jewelry cabinet
customer_reviews.text: i love this ! it holds a lot of rings, bracelets, necklaces, earrings and even has two drawers for anything else you need. very easy to assemble. it’s just wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Donna koscielski

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly as pictured. Comes with the screws needed to either add the over the door part or to mount on the wall. I have it over my door and use it every day as a mirror and to organize my jewelry. Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great piece
customer_reviews.text: I finally have jewelry so I can find things. I can see what I have, necklaces aren’t tangled. Earring bars a tiny bit thick, but workable.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth LaMotte-Moore

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter and it is awesome. It does not have a magnetic strip to close the door only a key but I actually love that because you know it will stay closed. It's very nicely built and is perfect. I have thought about purchasing one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have for jewelry collection!
customer_reviews.text: Love the level of organization. Makes it so easy to see everything you own and pick from. A great space saver!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: I was unable to lock this product. I ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to lock this product. I ordered it for my daughter dorm room and it was too much hastle to return..
customer_reviews.author: Sporty Forty

customer_reviews.title: Love this item
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful dual, space saving item. Is quite large, hangs over a door; and is a full length mirror. Unlike other comments~ mine stays closed. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: A must for organization
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! Money well spent. I put it over my door, it is completely stable, and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Useful And Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Not too bad overall. I don't lock it, so I don't know if that parts good or bad. Nice color and very functional. Have to place things inside with some consideration, otherwise the door won't close. I like it and works well for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again, great product!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! Holds a lot of jewelry. Locks shut. So glad I purchased this. Would but again. No more jewelry all over the place!
customer_reviews.author: Heather O.

customer_reviews.title: No bangles but good for the price
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put together! My only complaint is that you can’t put bangles or a lot of jewelry inside or else it won’t shut. It also doesn’t stay shut unless it’s locked.
customer_reviews.author: RunningBear

customer_reviews.title: great the only thing I didn't like was that the ...
customer_reviews.text: great the only thing I didn't like was that the door keeper opening and sometimes the key dose not work. My husband had to find a away to keep the door closed.
customer_reviews.author: Marcela Yzaguirre

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but the quality was poor
customer_reviews.text: The pressed wood was chipped off. Had a lot of imperfections. Nice product but the quality was poor.
customer_reviews.author: Francine

customer_reviews.title: Works ok for jewelry box but not to secure
customer_reviews.text: It works well. The only downside is that the key only worked once and you really had to work it (it’s a keyhole type lock). Mine is attached to the wall but the door still swings open. I put Velcro command strips on the door and it keeps it closed.
customer_reviews.author: April D

customer_reviews.title: Jewelry hanger
customer_reviews.text: This items came with no hooks, screws, or instructions. When asked i was told I had to pay 15.00 dollars for those items WHAT HELL NO. Don't purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Smith

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and organized!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this jewelry cabinet. It fits all my things perfectly. Everything is organized and separate which makes it super easy to find what I want. It was easy to put together. Highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Lunkenheimer

customer_reviews.title: BEYOND AMAZING PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a great price!! Seriously I was wooooo-ed by how great quality it is with great finishing.. it's so big it fits all my jewelry and the mirror is so nice and long!!!! 100% recommend this seller cause it's better that what they sell at good stores and I'm not gonna mention names but RECOMMENDED.
customer_reviews.author: FatimahQA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I love this. All my jewelry in one place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, nicely organizes all my jewelry
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, nicely organizes all my jewelry. Hung inside bathroom closet door and my husband did put 2 Extra screws in to hold it better since the door is always being opened & closed. Love it !
customer_reviews.author: Julia P

customer_reviews.title: Great product very useful
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my daughter-in-law she very happy with it and was able to put it up herself
customer_reviews.author: Daniel E. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this. Motivated me to buy more jewelry. I love that I can see all my pieces of jewelry. I’m not a big ring person but I use those for my stud earrings. Great product quality, comfort, utility.
customer_reviews.author: Irma Fuego

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly behind the door
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife as a place to store jewelry in a place that wouldn’t be in the way or unsightly. This worked out perfectly easy to assemble and don’t shake or move when opening and closing the door.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Thornell

customer_reviews.title: I went with the he Velcro option because otherwise it’s a great
customer_reviews.text: As stated by many other purchasers, this product would be five star if locking mechanism worked properly. I went with the he Velcro option because otherwise it’s a great product
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: I love this. It was easy to put up
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It was easy to put up. It is nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Alderin

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: thank goodness it came in one piece and it looks amazing. it holds all of my jewelry and fits behind my door perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine G.Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Need a magnet
customer_reviews.text: Alike other customers I really liked this product. Not 4 stars just because you have to lock it in order to keep it close but then it just unlock itself. I put a magnet on it & worked fine. I found that I could just hang bigger earrings & the small ones I just put one the shelves, no big deal. Looks nice & has a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: fabiola

customer_reviews.title: In love with this!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love with this purchase! Was easy to mount on the wall, very spacious, lock works, and overall really good quality! Exceeded my expectations by far for the price paid!!!! Big times recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Love the piece but the lock is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Love the piece but the lock is terrible. It doesn’t catch and just the slightest touch on the door will cause it to open. If you are looking for something really safe and secure- don’t get his piece. If you don’t mind this being open most of the time, go for it
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife as a christmas present and she loved it. Holds all of her jewelry plus some! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Space saver
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a space saver. This came in real handy after having a baby and having the need for more space for our little boys stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Servin

customer_reviews.title: Pay a little more and get better quality.
customer_reviews.text: Not the best contruction and locking mechanism is junk, get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Doss

customer_reviews.title: Assembly is demanding
customer_reviews.text: I am really disappointed with the product because both small drawers are demanding Should be shipping out that way so fare I payed for new product and used
customer_reviews.author: RABIJE GJONBALAJ

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty good with a couple caveats. It must be locked to stay closed. The earring storage is wonky. I have a lot of fish hooks and the earring storage rails are a bit deep for those to hang easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Solved our space problems on the top of the chest.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Jewelry Cabinet 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this Jewelry Cabinet .Looks fabulous and has plenty of room for my Jewelry Great mirror .Just love it . l Would recomend it to my Girl Friends 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Crowley Furlong

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it, however the door kept unlocking so I used a simple fix Velcro .
customer_reviews.author: HappyFace

customer_reviews.title: Lots of spaced, warped sides though
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had it very long and it is already warped on the side. Should have magnets all through the door and not just one spot.
customer_reviews.author: Chey

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Lock does not work and the door stays open - supplier only offers 60 day return and we missed the cutoff by 7 days. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D. Matusow

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good deal for the price but locking mechanism does not work. Im using velcro substitute. Still happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Raanan Guiliani

customer_reviews.title: Great piece
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my jewelry organized used and sits on the back of my closet door . Great quality
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Was already assembled. Just had to put on hooks for door. My daughter loves it! Has a lot more storage than expected. And a key to keep it locked.
customer_reviews.author: Brgaidar

customer_reviews.title: great.
customer_reviews.text: Love this jewelry box. Mounted on wall did not use door hanger.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good. Looks nice, but had to ask my husband to fix the lock, wouldn’t close.
customer_reviews.author: Olga S

customer_reviews.title: Very practical!
customer_reviews.text: It’s more practical than the jewelry boxes. Displays all the jewelry well and now I can wear what I own. I hung it on the door and it is quite secure!! Looks nice! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Anshul Kakar

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I recieved this product broken. The mirror was completely shattered. I’m bummed seemed like a pretty cool way to organize my jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Neat product, however, we received it with several ...
customer_reviews.text: Neat product, however, we received it with several cosmetic blemishes. The door also did not stay shut when hung from a door - it would swing open. Nothing a few small magnets and glue could fix, but why do I have to apply magnets and glue to a $100 piece of furniture to get it to function?
customer_reviews.author: Samantha K. Miller

customer_reviews.title: nice product
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the hooks for the earrings, but over all it's nice
customer_reviews.author: Carla N.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy w this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this jewelry organizer. Made very well at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: LIRB

product_meta.title: Best Choice Products Mirrored Lockable Jewelry Cabinet Armoire Organizer w/Door Hanging Hooks and Wall Mount, White
product_meta.description:
Specifications:
Overall Dimensions: 14.75"(W) x 47.75"(H) x 3.5"(Thick)
Weight: 20.8 lbs.
Material: MDF, Glass, Velvet
Jewelry Capacity: 25 lbs.
Minimal assembly required (with hardware and instructions)

Package Includes:
Jewelry armoire
(2) Door hooks
Adhesive strip
(4) Screw covers
Hardware

BCP SKU: SKY2924
feature_bullets: HANGING OR WALL-MOUNTED ARMOIRE: Heavy-duty hooks let you save space as you hang this cabinet over your bedroom or closet door, while brackets on the back allow for wall mounting
AMPLE STORAGE SPACE: Includes 32 necklace hooks, 91 ring slots, 84 earring hooks, and a bracelet rod, with 2 cubbies and 5 lined shelves for additional storage
FULL-LENGTH MIRROR: Utilize the full-length mirror to make sure you've got on your very best look
LOCKABLE DOOR: Keep your beauty secrets safe and secure with this cabinet's lock and key to keep children out and prevent unwanted intrusion

SOFT VELVET LINING: Cabinet's velvet interior keeps jewelry safe from scratches, and its sturdy, engineered wood frame is built to last; OVERALL DIMENSIONS: 14.75"(W) x 47.75"(H) x 3.5"(Thick) Weight Capacity: 25 lbs.
